meanings.sent1: The movie was unhumorous, and I didn't laugh at all.
meanings.sent2: His unhumorous jokes fell flat with the audience.
meanings.sent3: The unhumorous situation made everyone groan instead of laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her unhumorous demeanor cast a shadow over the party.
meanings.sent5: The unhumorous clown failed to entertain the children.

meanings.definition: Lacking humor or the ability to make others laugh.
meanings.sent1: She had an unhumorous personality that made it hard to connect with others.
meanings.sent2: The comedian's unhumorous performance left the crowd disappointed.
meanings.sent3: Despite his best efforts, his unhumorous stories just made people yawn.
meanings.sent4: The unhumorous atmosphere in the room made it difficult to lighten the mood.
meanings.sent5: His unhumorous remarks made everyone uncomfortable instead of amused.
